item.title: Website
item.description:
About Me

Personal website for Josh Fearing. Currently living in a housing cooperative in my birthplace: Madison, Wisconsin.

Education / Work / Skills

I graduated from Vassar College in 2023 with degrees in Philosophy and German. In 2026, I received a Professional Capstone Certificate in Computer Sciences from the University of Wisconsin-Madison. Since graduating I’ve worked at Epic Systems, where I focus on analytics products for clinician efficiency and regulatory programs.

This Site

I write this site in orgmode using Emacs - Doom Emacs, specifically. I convert these .org files to .md files and serve them with Hugo.
